Hair: Dumbeldore'

column1: Accessories: He comes with two accessories: a pair of the new wands in a sandy color, which come together on a sprue, and the pensieve. The pensieve

column1: Play/Diaplay: He is very detailed, so looks great on display, and also has some useful parts for MOCers! He would also be great for play, and would fit well in many of the new Harry Potter sets!
